title: Modern Web Development with React
description: Learn modern web development using React, Redux, and related ecosystem tools to build scalable and interactive web applications.

lessons.title: React Fundamentals
lessons.content: Introduction to React components, JSX syntax, and the virtual DOM.

lessons.title: Component Lifecycle
lessons.content: Understanding React component lifecycle methods and hooks.

lessons.title: Managing State with Redux
lessons.content: Learn to use Redux for global state management in React applications.

lessons.title: Context API and Hooks
lessons.content: Using React Context API and hooks as alternatives to Redux.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: A comprehensive introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications using Python.

lessons.title: What is Machine Learning?
lessons.content: Introduction to machine learning concepts and terminology.

lessons.title: Types of Machine Learning
lessons.content: Supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning explained.

lessons.title: Linear Regression
lessons.content: Understanding and implementing linear regression models.

lessons.title: Classification Algorithms
lessons.content: Exploring logistic regression, decision trees, and random forests.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Master Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud infrastructure, services, and best practices for building scalable applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to AWS
lessons.content: Overview of AWS platform and services.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your AWS Account
lessons.content: Step-by-step guide to setting up and securing an AWS account.

lessons.title: EC2 and Virtual Servers
lessons.content: Creating and managing EC2 instances.

lessons.title: S3 and Storage Solutions
lessons.content: Working with S3 for object storage and other AWS storage services.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Create beautiful cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, Google's UI toolkit.

lessons.title: Setting Up Flutter
lessons.content: Installing Flutter and setting up your development environment.

lessons.title: Dart Programming Language
lessons.content: Introduction to Dart language fundamentals.

lessons.title: Widgets and Layouts
lessons.content: Understanding Flutter's widget system and building layouts.

lessons.title: Navigation and Routing
lessons.content: Implementing navigation between screens in Flutter apps.

title: Full Stack JavaScript Development
description: Become a full stack developer using JavaScript for both front-end and back-end development with MERN stack.

lessons.title: Node.js Fundamentals
lessons.content: Introduction to Node.js runtime and basic server concepts.

lessons.title: Express.js Framework
lessons.content: Building RESTful APIs with Express.js.

lessons.title: Modern JavaScript
lessons.content: ES6+ features and best practices in JavaScript.

lessons.title: React Fundamentals
lessons.content: Building interactive UIs with React.

title: IoT System Design
description: Design and implement complete IoT systems from sensors to cloud, including hardware integration and software development.

lessons.title: IoT System Components
lessons.content: Understanding the key components of IoT systems.

lessons.title: Communication Protocols
lessons.content: Exploring MQTT, CoAP, and other IoT protocols.

lessons.title: Sensor Integration
lessons.content: Connecting and programming various sensors.

lessons.title: Microcontroller Programming
lessons.content: Programming microcontrollers for IoT applications.

title: Smart Home Automation
description: Learn to build and integrate smart home devices and systems using popular platforms and protocols.

lessons.title: Introduction to Smart Homes
lessons.content: Overview of smart home technologies and ecosystems.

lessons.title: Automation Platforms
lessons.content: Comparing Home Assistant, SmartThings, and other platforms.

lessons.title: Building Smart Switches
lessons.content: Creating your own WiFi-enabled smart switches.

lessons.title: Voice Control Integration
lessons.content: Adding voice assistant capabilities to your projects.

title: Industrial IoT Applications
description: Practical applications of IoT in industrial settings, including manufacturing automation and predictive maintenance.

lessons.title: IIoT vs Consumer IoT
lessons.content: Understanding the differences between industrial and consumer IoT.

lessons.title: Industry 4.0 Concepts
lessons.content: Exploring the fourth industrial revolution technologies.

lessons.title: Predictive Maintenance
lessons.content: Implementing predictive maintenance systems using IoT.

lessons.title: Manufacturing Automation
lessons.content: Automating manufacturing processes with IoT technologies.

title: Embedded Systems Programming
description: Comprehensive guide to programming embedded systems, from microcontrollers to real-time operating systems.

lessons.title: C for Embedded Systems
lessons.content: Specialized C programming techniques for resource-constrained environments.

lessons.title: Memory Management
lessons.content: Efficient memory management in embedded systems.

lessons.title: ARM Cortex-M Programming
lessons.content: Programming ARM Cortex-M series microcontrollers.

lessons.title: Peripheral Interfaces
lessons.content: Working with GPIO, UART, I2C, SPI, and other interfaces.

title: RTOS Development
description: Master real-time operating system concepts and development for embedded applications requiring precise timing.

lessons.title: Real-Time Concepts
lessons.content: Introduction to real-time computing and scheduling.

lessons.title: FreeRTOS Architecture
lessons.content: Understanding the architecture of FreeRTOS.

lessons.title: Task Management
lessons.content: Creating, scheduling, and managing tasks in an RTOS.

lessons.title: Inter-Task Communication
lessons.content: Using queues, semaphores, and mutexes for communication.

title: Effective Communication Skills
description: Develop essential communication skills for professional success, including verbal, non-verbal, and written communication.

lessons.title: Public Speaking Fundamentals
lessons.content: Mastering the basics of effective public speaking.

lessons.title: Active Listening
lessons.content: Developing active listening skills for better communication.

lessons.title: Business Writing
lessons.content: Writing clear and effective business communications.

lessons.title: Email Etiquette

title: Leadership and Team Management

lessons.title: Building Team Trust

lessons.title: Conflict Resolution

lessons.title: Pomodoro Technique
lessons.content: Using time boxing to enhance focus and productivity.

lessons.title: Logical Reasoning
lessons.content: Understanding inductive and deductive reasoning.

lessons.title: Cognitive Biases

lessons.title: Structured Problem Solving

lessons.title: Creative Problem Solving
lessons.content: Techniques for generating innovative solutions.

lessons.title: Negotiation Styles

lessons.title: BATNA and Leverage

lessons.content: Tools for understanding the root causes of conflicts.

lessons.title: Mediation Techniques
lessons.content: Approaches for mediating conflicts between others.

lessons.content: Programming basic autonomous behaviors like line following.

lessons.title: Robot Navigation
lessons.content: Implementing navigation stacks in ROS.

lessons.title: Computer Vision in ROS

description: Application of computer vision techniques in robotics for perception, object recognition, and visual servoing.

lessons.title: Camera Calibration
lessons.content: Techniques for calibrating cameras for robotics applications.

lessons.title: Image Processing
lessons.content: Basic image processing operations for robotics.

lessons.title: Object Detection
lessons.content: Implementing object detection for robotics using deep learning.

lessons.title: Visual SLAM
lessons.content: Simultaneous Localization and Mapping with visual data.

lessons.content: Hardware components of modern drones.

lessons.title: Programming with DJI SDK
lessons.content: Using the DJI SDK for drone programming.

lessons.title: Mission Planning

title: Industrial Robotics
description: Study industrial robotic systems, including manipulators, programming, integration, and applications in manufacturing.

lessons.title: Robot Kinematics
lessons.content: Understanding forward and inverse kinematics for robot arms.

lessons.title: Robot Programming Languages
lessons.content: Programming robots with languages like RAPID and KRL.

lessons.title: System Integration
lessons.content: Integrating robots with other manufacturing systems.

title: Mobile Robot Navigation
description: Advanced techniques for mobile robot navigation, localization, mapping, and path planning in various environments.

lessons.title: Probabilistic Localization

lessons.title: SLAM Fundamentals
lessons.content: Introduction to Simultaneous Localization and Mapping.

lessons.title: Classical Path Planning

lessons.title: Dynamic Path Planning

lessons.title: Authentication & Authorization
lessons.content: Implementing strong access control measures.

lessons.title: Advanced SQL

lessons.title: Database Optimization

lessons.title: IoT Security Architecture

lessons.content: Comparing edge and cloud approaches for IoT systems.

lessons.title: Edge Processing
lessons.content: Implementing data processing at the edge.

lessons.title: Energy-Aware Algorithms
lessons.content: Developing algorithms optimized for energy efficiency.
